Title: NA
Description: Cumulative sum of all distances traveled within the beam break system (excluding running wheel if present). This includes fine movement (such as grooming and scratching), as well as directed locomotion. _M denotes mean during 30s sampling

Title: Activity
Description: Sum of all distances traveled within the beam break system (excluding running wheel if present). This includes fine movement (such as grooming and scratching), as well as directed locomotion. _R denotes range from last cage sample to current cage sample - in other words, the total distance the mouse traveled since the cage was last selected.

Title: NA
Description: Cage number

Title: Body Mass
Description: Mean body mass of animal

Title: Cumulative Food Intake
Description: Mass of food consumed by animal during the cycle

Title: Energy Expenditure
Description: Mean energy expenditure in kcal/hr. Calculated using the Weir equation

Title: NA
Description: Sum of all directed ambulatory locomotion within the beam break system (excludes wheel if present). For defining directed locomotion, the macros use a cutoff speed of 1 cm/s - if the animals travel at that speed or faster, it is considered to be directed locomotion.

Title: Directed Activity
Description: Sum of all directed ambulatory locomotion within the beam break system (excludes wheel if present). For defining directed locomotion, the macros use a cutoff speed of 1 cm/s - if the animals travel at that speed or faster, it is considered to be directed locomotion.

Title: Directed Speed
Description: Mean directed ambulatory locomotion speed. _Mnz indicates zero values were excluded in calculating the mean

Title: RER
Description: Mean respiratory exchange ratio, VCO2/VO2, unitless

Title: vCO2
Description: Rate of carbon dioxide emission

Title: vH2O
Description: Rate of water vapor loss

Title: vO2
Description: Rate of oxygen consumption

Title: Cumulative Water Intake
Description: Mass of water consumed by animal during the cycle

Title: Beam Breaks (x)
Description: Number of x-axis beam breaks

Title: Beam Breaks (y)
Description: Number of y-axis beam breaks

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: NA

Title: NA
Description: Temporary variable. Calculated from EE. Since each value in EE is an instantaneous measurement of kcal/hr, to get the approximate kcal burned across the sampling interval, EE was multiplied by the interval in hours (e.g., 0.05h for a 3-minute interval)

Title: Cumulative Activity
Description: Calculated from AllMeters using cumsum()

Title: Food Intake
Description: Calculated from FoodIn.cum using diff()

Title: Water Intake
Description: Calculated from WaterIn.cum using diff()

Title: Food Intake
Description: Calculated from FoodIn.g*4.2

Title: Energy Balance
Description: Calculated as calories in minus calories out: FoodIn.kcal - EE.kcal.bin

Title: Normalized Energy Expenditure
Description: Energy expenditure normalized to body mass (g). Calculated as EE/meanBodyMass

Title: Normalized Energy Balance
Description: Energy balance normalized to body mass (g). Calculated as EBalance/meanBodyMass

Title: Cumulative Energy Expenditure
Description: Cumulative energy expenditure

Title: Cumulative Energy Balance
Description: Cumulative energy balance

Title: Cumulative Food Intake
Description: Cumulative food intake in kilocalories; computed as FoodIn.cum * diet.kcal (hard-coded variable at front end of script)

Title: Mean Daily Body mass
Description: Calculated from BodyMass. Averaged for each experimental day, used to compute all variables beginning with "norm."

Title: vO2
Description: Rate of oxygen consumption, smoothed via moving mean

Title: vCO2
Description: Rate of carbon dioxide emission, smoothed via moving mean

Title: vH2O
Description: Rate of water vapor loss, smoothed via moving mean

Title: Energy Expenditure
Description: Mean energy expenditure in kcal/hr. Calculated using the Weir equation. Smoothed via moving mean

Title: Energy Balance
Description: Calculated as calories in minus calories out: FoodIn.kcal - EE.kcal.bin. Smoothed via moving mean

Title: RER
Description: Mean respiratory exchange ratio, VCO2/VO2, unitless. Smoothed via moving mean

Title: Cumulative Activity
Description: Calculated from AllMeters using cumsum() smoothed via moving mean

Title: Cumulative Food Intake
Description: Mass of food consumed by animal during the cycle. Smoothed via moving mean

Title: Cumulative Water Intake
Description: Mass of water consumed by animal during the cycle. Smoothed via moving mean

Title: Food Intake
Description: Calculated from FoodIn.g*3.35 (NCD) or 5.47 (HFD). Smoothed via moving mean

Title: Body Mass
Description: Body mass of animal. Smoothed via moving mean

Title: Cumulative Energy Expenditure
Description: Cumulative energy expenditure. Smoothed via moving mean
